hero.headline: Redesigning Grid Operations for Texas's Largest Public Power Utility
hero.subtitle: LCRA (Lower Colorado River Authority) needed improved situational awareness during peak demand and emergency conditions. We redesigned the operator interface for 24/7 critical operations.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: LCRA needed to redesign the operator interface for Texas's largest public power utility. The goal: improved situational awareness during peak demand and emergency conditions — when seconds matter.

cards.title: 24/7 Critical Operations
cards.description: Grid operators work around the clock. The interface must support sustained attention during normal operations and rapid response during emergencies.

cards.title: Peak Demand Visibility
cards.description: During peak demand events, operators need instant visibility into grid status, load distribution, and available reserves.

cards.title: Emergency Response
cards.description: When conditions deteriorate, the interface must shift from monitoring mode to action mode — clearly guiding operators through emergency protocols.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We studied control room operations to understand how operators maintain situational awareness across complex systems.

steps.title: Control Room Research
steps.description: Observation and interviews with grid operators during both normal and high-stress conditions.

steps.title: Information Hierarchy
steps.description: Designing progressive disclosure that shows the right information at the right level of detail for each operational context.

steps.title: Emergency Visualization
steps.description: Creating clear visual escalation patterns that shift the interface from monitoring to action during emergencies.

steps.title: Validation
steps.description: Testing with operators under simulated peak demand and emergency scenarios.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: A complete redesign of the grid operations interface optimized for sustained attention and rapid emergency response.

cards.title: Operator Interface Redesign
cards.description: Complete redesign of the primary control room interface with improved information hierarchy and visual clarity.

cards.title: Emergency Visualization
cards.description: Visual escalation system that clearly communicates severity and guides operator response during critical conditions.

cards.title: Peak Demand Monitoring
cards.description: Real-time dashboard for monitoring grid load, reserves, and distribution during high-demand periods.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Measurable improvements in operator decision-making speed and situational awareness during critical operations.

metrics.label: Faster Decisions in Critical Situations
metrics.description: Operators make critical decisions 50% faster with the redesigned interface.

metrics.label: Operations Support Enabled
metrics.description: Interface designed for sustained 24/7 operation with reduced cognitive fatigue.

metrics.label: Situational Awareness
metrics.description: Control room operators report significantly improved understanding of grid status.

metrics.label: Emergency Response
metrics.description: Clear visual escalation patterns improve emergency response capabilities.
